data.title: Rules & Judging Info – T. Gaines Entertainment
data.text:
CONTESTANT RULES

(Amateurs Only) Must not earn more than 50% of your living as a singer or performer

You must utilize the library of T.Gaines Ent for your contest songs choices

Contestants MUST be in costume to that fits song selection

Contestants are allowed a max of 3 extras (Background singers, dancers, skit performers)

Contestants must use two props during there performance

Grand Prize $600 Dollars / Also second and third place prices

Judging Criteria

VOCAL ABILITY: Ability to hit the correct notes in the song, sing in tempo, with correct emotion and breathing.

STAGE PRESENCE / Audience Interaction: Audience Interaction: Does the singer sing to the audience? Are they able to connect and engage the audience? Was the entire crowd responding?

Stage Presence: Is the singer comfortable performing? Does he or she move or dance, etc?

INTERPRETATION: Do you look and or sound like the star? Or did you make the song unique to your style?
